description: '''Afro tech''' (also '''Afro-tech''' or '''AfroTech''') is a sub-genre of [[afro house]] which originates and is predominantly made in South Africa. It emerged in the 2010s. South African DJs and [[Record producer|music producers]] who popularized the genre include [[Black Coffee (DJ)|Black Coffee]], [[Culoe De Song]], Bekzin Terris, [[Euphonik|Euphonik ( DJ Themba)]], Punk Mbedzi, [[DJ Tira]], [[Zakes Bantwini]], [[Shimza (DJ)|Shimza]] and [[Da Capo (DJ)|Da Capo]].
